result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nathan Kirill Nelson

records.addlTxt:
The original document was titled: Pretrial Assessment Report
The original history event date is: 11-03-2022

11:18 AM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: B Harris. Defendant Nathan Kirill Nelson in court.  Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin. Court reviews file and notes DE does qualify for PD. DE's dad states PD has conferences this week so no one could be here.  Court questions DE.  DE responds.  Court finds good cause to push out PH for today and reschedules the matter to have an Atty appointed. DE confirms phone number on file. Adjourned at 11:21 AM. bph
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 14, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Pre-trial conference on November 14, 2022 at 11:15 am.

2:51 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Fox, Defendant Nathan Kirill Nelson in court pro se with his Father. Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant does not have an attorney however, does qualify for a public defender. Court resets hearing to check on attorney. Def is residing at Onyx for now.
Status conference scheduled for November 3, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Status conference on November 3, 2022 at 11:15 am.

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

- Defendant shall contact Kara Rheingans, Case Manager - Behavioral Health at 715-716-0920 within 48 hours. Ms. Rheingans shall conduct an intake screening to determine appropriateness for inclusion in programming offered by Behavioral Health. If you are screened in for services, you shall participate in programming as recommended. Failure to contact Ms. Rheingans or participate may be considered a violation of your bond. 

- Defendant to live at Onyx House and participate in programing

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Dicks Fresh Market.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats. THIS CONDITION SHALL ONLY BE EFFECTIVE UPON THE EXPIRATION OF A 72 HOUR NO CONTACT ORDER.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:44 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Bela Alexander Ballo in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court. Defendant Nathan Kirill Nelson in court, in custody. Court reviews case. Atty Dolfi notes there is not an atty appointed yet. ADA Ballo does not object to signature bond. Atty Dolfi makes statements re: residence. Court amends bond. Court sets STC. Adjourned
Status conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Status conference on October 26, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
Filed by DA Office Selena P. arc

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant. 

- Defendant shall contact Kara Rheingans, Case Manager - Behavioral Health at 715-716-0920 within 48 hours. Ms. Rheingans shall conduct an intake screening to determine appropriateness for inclusion in programming offered by Behavioral Health. If you are screened in for services, you shall participate in programming as recommended. Failure to contact Ms. Rheingans or participate may be considered a violation of your bond. 

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Dicks Fresh Market.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

2:06 PM CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Stephanie Schmidt in court. Defendant Nathaniel Kirill Nelson in court, in custody. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant qualifies for PD. Bond arguments. Court orders bond. Court sets STC. Adjourned
Status conference scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on October 19, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
